lyrics.lyric: When I was young I'd listen to the radio
lyrics.tlyric: 我还年轻的时候，喜欢听收音机

lyrics.lyric: When they played I'd sing along
lyrics.tlyric: 当他们演奏时，我会随之吟唱

lyrics.lyric: Those were such happy times and not so long ago
lyrics.tlyric: 那些是多么幸福的时光！就在不久以前

lyrics.lyric: how I wondered where they'd gone
lyrics.tlyric: 我想知道它们曾去何处

lyrics.lyric: But they're back again just like a long lost friend
lyrics.tlyric: 而今它们再次出现，就像失散的旧友重逢

lyrics.lyric: all the songs I loved so well
lyrics.tlyric: 所有的歌曲我都如此的喜爱

lyrics.lyric: When they get to the part
It can really make me cry
Looking back on how it was in years gone by
And the good times that I had
It was songs of love that I would sing to then
lyrics.tlyric: 那时我跟唱着这些爱之歌

lyrics.lyric: Those old melodies still sound so good to me
lyrics.tlyric: 那些熟悉的旋律，在我听来还是那么好

lyrics.lyric: As they melt the years away
Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines
All my best memories come back clearly to me
lyrics.tlyric: 我所有美好的记忆清晰的重现

lyrics.lyric: Some can even make me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 有一些仍能使我哭出来

lyrics.lyric: Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines
Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines.

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Richard Carpenter/JOHN & BETTY
[00:00.719] 作曲 : Richard Carpenter/JOHN & BETTY
[00:01.438] 编曲 : Carpenters
[00:02.157] 制作人 : Karen Carpenter/Richard Carpenter
[00:02.879]When I was young I'd listen to the radio
[00:08.918]Waiting for my favorite songs
[00:14.559]When they played I'd sing along
[00:19.259]It made me smile
[00:23.909]Those were such happy times and not so long ago
[00:32.298]how I wondered where they'd gone
[00:37.890]But they're back again just like a long lost friend
[00:43.979]all the songs I loved so well
[00:49.239]Every shalalala every wo'wo
[00:55.829]Still shines
[01:01.679]Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[01:04.249]That they're starting to sing
[01:06.990]So fine
[01:13.119]When they get to the part
[01:15.669]Where he's breaking her heart
[01:19.900]It can really make me cry
[01:24.200]Just like before
[01:29.289]It's yesterday once more
[01:38.890](shoobie do lang lang)
[01:42.178]Looking back on how it was in years gone by
[01:47.828]And the good times that I had
[01:54.190]Makes today seem rather sad
[01:58.349]So much has changed
[02:07.390]It was songs of love that I would sing to then
[02:11.228]and I'd memorize each word
[02:16.168]Those old melodies still sound so good to me
[02:23.198]As they melt the years away
[02:29.390]Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines
[02:39.998]Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[02:42.327]That they're starting to sing
[02:45.648]So fine
[02:51.577]All my best memories come back clearly to me
[02:56.868]Some can even make me cry
[03:01.879]Just like before
[03:07.698]It's yesterday once more
[03:10.659](shoobie do lang lang)
[03:14.898]Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines
[03:26.238]Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[03:29.398]That they're starting to sing
[03:31.668]So fine
[03:36.898]Every shalalala every wo'wo still shines.

tlyric.lyric:
[00:02.879]我还年轻的时候， 喜欢听收音机
[00:08.918]等待我最喜欢的歌曲
[00:14.559]当他们演奏时，我会随之吟唱
[00:19.259]这使我心情欢畅
[00:23.909]那些是多么幸福的时光！就在不久以前
[00:32.298]我想知道它们曾去何处
[00:37.890]而今它们再次出现，就像失散的旧友重逢
[00:43.979]所有的歌曲我都如此的喜爱
[00:49.239]每一句sha-la-la-la每一句wo-wo
[00:55.829]依旧闪烁
[01:01.679]每一句shing-a-ling-a-ling
[01:04.249]就在他们放声歌唱时
[01:06.990]如此美妙
[01:13.119]当他们唱到一个地方
[01:15.669]他令她伤心断肠
[01:19.900]这真能叫我哭出来
[01:24.200]正如从前一样
[01:29.289]仿佛昔日又重来
[01:38.890]无比惆怅
[01:42.178]回头看岁月如何消逝
[01:47.828]这些过去的好时光
[01:54.190]使今天显得令人哀伤
[01:58.349]一切都已不再
[02:07.390]那时我跟唱着这些爱之歌
[02:11.228]我会记住每一句歌词
[02:16.168]那些熟悉的旋律，在我听来还是那么好
[02:23.198]好像他们把岁月融消
[02:29.390]每一句sha-la-la-la每一句wo-wo仍闪烁
[02:39.998]每一句shing-a-ling-a-ling
[02:42.327]就在他们放声歌唱时
[02:45.648]如此美妙
[02:51.577]我所有美好的记忆清晰的重现
[02:56.868]有一些仍能使我哭出来
[03:01.879]正如从前一样
[03:07.698]这是昨日再现
[03:10.659]无比惆怅
[03:14.898]每一句sha-la-la-la每一句wo-wo仍闪烁
[03:26.238]每一句shing-a-ling-a-ling
[03:29.398]就在他们放声歌唱时
[03:31.668]如此美妙
[03:36.898]每一句sha-la-la-la每一句wo-wo仍闪烁
